For an automatically-curated list of recent publications please see here Recent Highlights: New Course: Analysis of Object-Oriented Data (Spring 2013) Protein Structure Evolution Model for Alignment and Phylogeny  (Dec '11) Dramatically improves results for distantly related sequences. with Chris Challis. Convergence Diagnostics for Molecular Simulations  (Oct '11) Monitoring convergence properly in the presence of long time-scale kinetic traps. with Kevin Wiehe. Designing an HIV Vaccine - CS Newsletter (June '11) Geometric Convergence for Lennard-Jones Potentials  (April '11) The first result we're aware of for realistic potentials, albeit for a very simple system. with Mattingly, Cooke, McKinley. Convergence Rate Bounds for Adaptive MCMC Algorithms The first non-asmyptotic bounds I'm aware of; shows that some popular methods cannot improve convergence. with Dawn Woodard. α-Stable Limit Laws for Harmonic Mean Estimators of Marginal Likelihood The nail in the coffin for HME methods (we hope!). with Robert Wolpert. ≪more≫ Estimating Parameters of Ising and Potts Models Compares computational methods for Bayesian estimation, applied to protein threading. with Xiang Zhou. Reservoir Methods in Molecular Dynamics Shows theoretical problems with reservoir REMD, and gives corrections. with Kevin Wiehe. Probabilistic Multiple Protein Structure Alignment with Rui Wang.
